import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {Row, Col, Container, Button, Form} from "react-bootstrap"; import LoggedInNavigation from "./LoggedInNavigation"; const UpdateProfile = () => { const[first_name, setFirstName] = useState(""); const[last_name, setLastName] = useState(""); const[email, setEmail] = useState(""); const[phone_number, setPhoneNumber] = useState(""); return ( <>
setFirstName(event.target.value)} style={{height: "2.7rem", marginBottom: "1rem", padding: "1.5rem", fontSize: 25, borderRadius: 20, borderBottom: "3px solid grey" }} /> setLastName(event.target.value)} style={{height: "2.7rem", marginBottom: "1rem", padding: "1.5rem", fontSize: 25, borderRadius: 20, borderBottom: "3px solid grey" }} /> setEmail(event.target.value)} style={{ height: "2.7rem", marginBottom: "1rem", padding: "1.5rem", fontSize: 25, borderRadius: 20, borderBottom: "3px solid grey" }}/> setPhoneNumber(event.target.value)} style={{height: "2.7rem", marginBottom: "1rem", padding: "1.5rem", fontSize: 25, borderRadius: 20, borderBottom: "3px solid grey" }} />

{errorMessage}

Not registered yet? Sign up here!

) } export default UpdateProfile
